ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( RecordType.Name = "Digicel Business Opportunity", RecordType.Name = "Digicel PNG ICT")
&&
AND ( CASE( StageName, "Solution Design", 1, "Commercial Review", 1, "Proposal Review", 1, "Proposal Acceptance", 1, "Closed Won", 1, "Billed", 1, 0) = 1, NOT(HasOpportunityLineItem) )
&& $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator"
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
In order to advance your opportunity past the "Prospecting & Qualification" stage you must first add a product.
To save your changes move the stage back to "Prospecting & Qualification" and press save.
